turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, will you place an order for me with Pizza hut please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, I will pull up your account now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a Specialty with the works and a all meat pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, Large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make them both a large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do, total is $21

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, you can charge my card on file

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Visa?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it looks like that should be ready for pick up in about minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am sending a receipt confirmation to your mobile now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I appreciate all your help, Did you say minutes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that's great timing

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, then you're all set unless there is something else I can do for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it, thanks! Talk to you later, bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, bye!
